info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:40PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ogle and Winnebago Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 938 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of Polo to near Rochelle. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockford, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, Rochelle, South Beloit, Rockton, Byron, Oregon, Mount Morris, Polo, Rockford Airport, Cherry Valley, Winnebago, Davis Junction, Pecatonica, Forreston, Durand, Hillcrest and Stillman Valley. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 97 and 123. I-88 between mile markers 75 and 82. I-90 between mile markers 1 and 18. This includes... Castle Rock State Park, Lowden State Park, Ogle County Fairgrounds, Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, Rockford Rivets Baseball, Rockford Speedway, White Pines State Park, and Winnebago County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
